trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set to a value that cannot be interpreted as a date or when the date cannot be selected.
You can subscribe to this event and specify whether an exception is raised by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A> property.

If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `true`, one of the following exceptions is raised: |Exception type|Condition| |--------------------|---------------| |<xref:System.FormatException>|The text entered cannot be parsed to a valid date, and the exception is not suppressed.| |<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>|The text entered parses to a date that is not selectable.| If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `false`, the application continues execution as usual.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs"></xref> class.
The initial exception from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError"></xref> event.
The text that caused the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError"></xref> event.
Gets the initial exception associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError"></xref> event.
The exception associated with the validation failure.
Gets or sets the text that caused the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError"></xref> event.
The text that caused the validation failure.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.Exception*> should be thrown.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the exception should be thrown; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
